name: tripsync-web
description: TripSync 网页版 MVP - 小红书链接收藏、AI生成行程、高德路线规划、协作分享

scripts.init: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dataDir = path.join(__dirname, 'backend', 'data'); if (!fs.existsSync(dataDir)) fs.mkdirSync(dataDir, { recursive: true }); ['users.json', 'collections.json', 'trips.json', 'shares.json'].forEach(f => { const file = path.join(dataDir, f); if (!fs.existsSync(file)) fs.writeFileSync(file, '[]'); }); console.log('数据文件初始化完成');"
